title: Coachella Friday Livestream: Lady Gaga, Missy Elliott, LISA & More
description: Coachella's Friday livestream also promises sets from The Prodigy, The Marías, Mustard, Tyla, The Go-Go's, and Three 6 Mafia. Coachella Friday Livestream: Lady Gaga, Missy Elliott, LISA & More Consequence Staff
author: Consequence Staff
excerpt: Coachella's livestream schedule for Friday, April 11th features Lady Gaga, Missy Elliott, LISA, The Prodigy, and more. Tune in here and see the set times.
text: Coachella 2025 officially kicks off today, Friday, April 11th, and nearly all of day’s sets will be streamed online via YouTube and Coachella’s app. Friday’s livestream schedule includes Lady Gaga, Missy Elliott, LISA, The Prodigy, The Marías, Mustard, Tyla, Benson Boone, DJO, The Go-Go’s, Three 6 Mafia, KNEECAP, Miike Snow, Glixen, julie, and more. Coachella’s livestream is presented across seven channels — each dedicated to a specific festival stage. What’s more, the YouTube stream is offering a multiview option, allowing viewers to watch up to four different stages at once. Friday’s full schedule can be found below. All times are PST, and the specific channel number is marked in parentheses. Coachella, April 11th – Livestream Schedule Channel 1: 04:20 – Thee Sacred Souls 05:40 – Marina 07:10 – Benson Boone 09:00 – Missy Elliott 11:10 – Lady Gaga Channel 2: 04:05 – Seun Kuti & Egypt 05:25 – The Go-Go’s 06:45 – Tyla 08:20 – The Marias 10:10 – Parcels 11:10 – The Martinez Brothers & Loco Dice Channel 3: 04:00 – Chris Lorenzo 05:15 – Three 6 Mafia 06:10 – Sara Landry 07:15 – Austin Millz 07:45 – LISA 09:10 – Yeat 10:25 – GloRilla 11:50 – Mustard Channel 4: 04:00 – Maribou State 04:50 – Lola Young 05:40 – Ravyn Lenae 06:05 – DJO 07:20 – Eyedress 08:35 – Miike Snow 10:05 – The Prodigy 11:20 – Chris Lake Channel 5: 04:00 – Maribou State 04:45 – 4Batz 05:30 – Parisi 05:55 – d4vd 07:00 – A.G. Cook 08:15 – Artemas 09:30 – Ca7riel & Paco Amoroso 10:40 – Indo Warehouse Channel 6: 04:00 – Tops 05:00 – julie 05:45 – Glixen 06:10 – Kneecap 07:05 – vs self 07:30 – Los Mirlos 08:40 – Speed 10:00 – Hitech Main Stage – Channel 1 Outdoor Theatre – Channel 2 Sahara – Channel 3 Mojave – Channel 4 Gobi – Channel 5 Sonora – Channel 6 Quasar – Channel 7
html:
Coachella 2025 officially kicks off today, Friday, April 11th, and nearly all of day’s sets will be streamed online via YouTube and Coachella’s app.

Friday’s livestream schedule includes Lady Gaga, Missy Elliott, LISA, The Prodigy, The Marías, Mustard, Tyla, Benson Boone, DJO, The Go-Go’s, Three 6 Mafia, KNEECAP, Miike Snow, Glixen, julie, and more.

Coachella’s livestream is presented across seven channels — each dedicated to a specific festival stage. What’s more, the YouTube stream is offering a multiview option, allowing viewers to watch up to four different stages at once.

Friday’s full schedule can be found below. All times are PST, and the specific channel number is marked in parentheses.

Coachella, April 11th – Livestream Schedule

Channel 1:
04:20 – Thee Sacred Souls
05:40 – Marina
07:10 – Benson Boone
09:00 – Missy Elliott
11:10 – Lady Gaga

Channel 2:
04:05 – Seun Kuti & Egypt
05:25 – The Go-Go’s
06:45 – Tyla
08:20 – The Marias
10:10 – Parcels
11:10 – The Martinez Brothers & Loco Dice

Channel 3:
04:00 – Chris Lorenzo
05:15 – Three 6 Mafia
06:10 – Sara Landry
07:15 – Austin Millz
07:45 – LISA
09:10 – Yeat
10:25 – GloRilla
11:50 – Mustard

Channel 4:
04:00 – Maribou State
04:50 – Lola Young
05:40 – Ravyn Lenae
06:05 – DJO
07:20 – Eyedress
08:35 – Miike Snow
10:05 – The Prodigy
11:20 – Chris Lake

Channel 5:
04:00 – Maribou State
04:45 – 4Batz
05:30 – Parisi
05:55 – d4vd
07:00 – A.G. Cook
08:15 – Artemas
09:30 – Ca7riel & Paco Amoroso
10:40 – Indo Warehouse

Channel 6:
04:00 – Tops
05:00 – julie
05:45 – Glixen
06:10 – Kneecap
07:05 – vs self
07:30 – Los Mirlos
08:40 – Speed
10:00 – Hitech

Main Stage – Channel 1

Outdoor Theatre – Channel 2

Sahara – Channel 3

Mojave – Channel 4

Gobi – Channel 5

Sonora – Channel 6

Quasar – Channel 7
